text: "Whats Poppin" is the first single off of American rapper Jack Harlow's debut studio album Thats What They All Say. The song was released on January 21, 2020. The song was nominated for Best Rap Song at the 63rd Grammy Awards but lost to Megan Thee Stallion's Savage. On November 4, 2021, a music video for the song was released. The music video was directed by Cole Bennett and uploaded on his Lyrical Lemonade channel. It features Harlow rapping in and outside of a diner. On June 24, 2020, an official remix was released. It featured Canadian rapper Tory Lanez and American rapper Lil Wayne and DaBaby. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Whats Poppin" on YouTube Category:2020 songs Category:Jack Harlow songs
title: Whats Poppin
